room_title: Escape room "The Detectives" by Mastermind Room Escape Challenge in Cedar City
room_address: 5 North Main Street, Suite 305 Cedar City, UT 84720
room_description:
Players will be tasked with identifying the suspect in a series of bank heists. During the last heist, the suspect took the victim bank teller hostage. The detectives just received a ransom note from the suspect claiming they have one hour to get the ransom money to him or he'll injure the bank teller.
There are several possible suspects. Only the information from the correct suspect will hold the clues to progress through the myriad of puzzles and codes that lead to the vault with the money. If the players select the wrong suspect, they have to go back to the rookie's desk and get it right in order to move forward. Work smart, her life is depending on it!
